activities.title: How to Build a Lead Enrichment Workflow in 10 Minutes
activities.summary: Clay's new template lets you enrich 10,000 leads/month with waterfalls across 50+ data sources. Step-by-step guide includes setup instructions, integration tips, and cost optimization strategies.

activities.title: Advanced Clay Workflows: Multi-Step Enrichment Demo
activities.summary: 15-minute walkthrough showing how to build complex enrichment sequences with conditional logic, data validation, and custom webhooks.

activities.title: Copy.ai Launches 'Agents Marketplace' with 50+ Pre-Built Workflows
activities.summary: New marketplace offers ready-to-use AI agents for sales, marketing, and support teams. Features include instant deployment, customizable templates, and integration with popular CRMs.

activities.title: Mastering Data Visualization with Tableau
activities.summary: Comprehensive guide covering advanced Tableau techniques for B2B analytics dashboards. Includes best practices for executive reporting and real-time data integration.

activities.title: Startup Funding 101: Navigating Your First Round
activities.summary: 90-minute live session covering pitch deck creation, investor outreach strategies, and term sheet negotiation tactics for early-stage founders.

activities.title: SEO Strategies for 2023: Stay Ahead of the Curve
activities.summary: 45-page comprehensive guide covering Google algorithm updates, technical SEO best practices, content optimization strategies, and link building tactics for modern B2B SaaS companies.

activities.title: How Company X Increased ROI by 150% in 6 Months
activities.summary: Detailed breakdown of marketing automation implementation, channel optimization, and attribution modeling that led to dramatic ROI improvements for mid-market B2B SaaS company.

activities.title: The Evolution of Social Media: A Decade in Review
activities.summary: Visual timeline showcasing major platform changes, algorithm updates, and engagement trend shifts across Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and emerging platforms over the past 10 years.
